welcome.language_selection:
🌍 *Welcome to Twin Gate!*

Hello {{firstName}}! Please select your preferred language to continue.
welcome.title: 🚪 *Welcome to Twin Gate!*
welcome.subtitle: Hello {{firstName}}! I'm your human identity verification assistant.
welcome.description: Prove your humanity and earn your unique digital identity.
welcome.what_you_get:
✨ *What you'll get:*
🏆 Exclusive Twin3 SBT (Soul Bound Token)
📊 Your Humanity Index score (0-255)
🔐 Decentralized identity authentication
welcome.get_started:
🚀 *Get started:*
Use /verify to start your verification process
Use /help to see all available commands

Ready to begin?

verification.task_description: Complete verification tasks to prove your humanity. The higher the level you complete, the higher your Humanity Index score.
verification.task_info: Choose from 3 verification levels using familiar methods. Your personal information is protected and not stored.
verification.requirement: Complete at least Level 2 to get free minting of your DNA NFT.

verification_in_progress.click_link: ✅ Click the link below to start verification:
verification_in_progress.complete_and_return: 📱 Please complete verification in the new window and return here to check status
verification_in_progress.level2_sbt_note: 🏆 Complete Level 2 to mint your SBT!
verification_in_progress.level3_max_score: 🏆 Complete Level 3 to get the highest Humanity Index!

verification.verification_url:
🔗 *Verification Link Ready*

Click the link below to complete your verification:

{{url}}

⏰ Link expires in 30 minutes
💡 Return here to check your results
verification.success_message: 🎉 Congratulations! Verification completed successfully. Your SBT is being prepared!
verification.retry_message: 💡 You can re-verify to improve your score. We recommend completing more verification levels to increase your Humanity Index.

buttons.complete_previous_level: 🔒 Please complete the previous level first

help.title: ❓ *Twin Gate Bot Help*
help.commands:
*Available Commands:*
/start - 🚀 Start your verification journey
/verify - ✅ Begin verification process
/status - 📊 Check verification status
/profile - 👤 View your profile
/sbt - 🏆 View SBT information
/help - ❓ Show this help message
help.verification_levels:
*Verification Levels:*
• Level 1 - Google reCAPTCHA
• Level 2 - SMS Verification
• Level 3 - Biometric Authentication
help.getting_started:
*Getting Started:*
1. Use 🚀 Start Verification to begin
2. Complete verification levels in order
3. Mint your SBT after completing Level 2
4. Achieve maximum Humanity Index with Level 3
help.support:
*Support:*
If you need assistance, please contact our support team or check our documentation.
help.privacy:
*Privacy:*
Your data is secure and encrypted. We only store necessary verification information.

errors.general: ❌ An error occurred, please try again later.
errors.auth_required: 🔐 Authentication required. Please use /start to register.
errors.api_error: ❌ Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
errors.verification_expired: ⏰ Verification link has expired, please start again.
